summary: I am a hardworking and highly motivated individual who accepts challenges and enjoys working in a multinational environment.

school.name: EIB The Victor Hugo International School

projects.title: Philips BeNeLux Campaign
projects.description:
Different dashboards was created to keep track of the weekly performance of a campaign. Different KPIs are created in the workbook, and they represent the weekly performance for a specific area that the customer wanted to keep track off. 
Data were collected with Analysis for Office and Adobe Analytics.
Reports were created through Microsoft Excel

projects.title: Inventory Allocation Report for European Market Leaders
projects.description: Weekly reports was created for the European market leaders to showcase the inventory slow moving status for every European market. The purpose of this report was to show an allocation of the European inventory to the markets. The reports shows the stock covered by forecast, orders and the slow moving stocks. Data were extracted through SAP BusinessWarehouse, with the help of Analysis for Office. Reports were created in Microsoft Excel

projects.title: Self-Service Reporting Proof of Concept
projects.description: The Self-service Proof of Concept project was initiated to provide proofs that a self-service tool would be more beneficial for Lighting in compare to having a department to create reports daily/weekly/monthly for everyone. The main purpose of the project was to migrate/replicate existing data in SAP BusinessWarehouse next to SAP Hana. Data would then be extracted through cross-tenancy.

projects.title: The Voice HUE UK Campaign
projects.description:
A dashboard was created to help the Digital Marketing team to keep track the performance of Philips HUE product along side the show the Voice. This dashboard displays the weekly KPI performance for different aspects of what needed to be track. For example: Social Media weekly performance, App usage performance, Website impression, and etc.
Data were collected with Adobe Analytic, Analysis for Office and from third party Havas.
Reports were created through Microsoft Excel.

projects.title: Zetes - Supply Chain
projects.description: Analysis of the organization functions in a company who specializes in Supply Chain solutions for Identifications and Mobility. Research, report and presentation were conducted at Zetes.

projects.title: DAF - Lean Six Sigma & Toyota's Way
projects.description: conducting a research about Toyota’s way and Lean Six Sigma and based on this, I visited DAF Factory and observe its practical application.

projects.title: Capgemini - Project Initiation Document for FastFood Company
projects.description: Development and implementation of a Chaos system for a make-belief fast food chain based on the end users requirements. Presentation of the findings was conducted in Capgemini office.

projects.title: Sligro - Warehouse Information about Business processes
projects.description: Evaluation and analysis of Sligro’s warehouse capabilities, IT infrastructure and company profile. A visit to their warehouse took place where I was able to observe the business process and information flow and present the findings.

projects.title: Accenture - Visual Self-Monitoring System
projects.description: Conducted a research and testing of a VSM system on a test shelf, which was provided by Accenture

profile_positions.title: Masterdata Management - European Business Process Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Working within Platform Operations pillar of the partner program team, responsible for launching products with the best possible content on our partner’s website ensuring best in class product presentation and data. The goal is to ensure partners launch our products on time and in full in the most premium way possible, whether it is through product images, copy and bullet points, attributes, or categorization. 

- Manage the product data and content End to end for Adidas and Reebok within Partner
Program Europe
- Maintain and Optimize product data in our middle-ware providers platforms (Marketplace
integrator)
- Capture Partner specific requirements and technical specification to ensure an optimal
presentation of our products on their websites (filter navigation, search-ability, data
quality)
- Proactively monitor the Article status reports from our partners on a weekly basis.
Clearly define the status of our articles and the actions that needs to be taken to ensure
a timely go-live.
- List the common errors you encounter and track time to onboard with our partners.
Create retrospective learning to drive better results for future product launches.
- Responsible for the creation, maintenance, transfer and reporting of correct and
consistent data between the adidas product management systems and Partner Program
vendor product systems.
- Align with our eCom Master Data team and our Global Asset Creation team to make sure
our partners product content requirement can be fulfilled prior to the launch.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager Master Data

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for maximizing the product assortment on both the Calvin Klein and partner site. Improve the back end data flow, and essentially bring together product and data from different sources effectively and efficiently. Works in close collaboration with the Merchandisers/Buyers, Site Merchandisers, Front Operations and Developers

Main Responsibilities:

• Manage master data to ensure new products, stock, pricing, imagery and product attributes are uploaded correctly in all systems and on site
• Acting as key contact for Front end Operations team, communicating bugs and errors within the master data and implementing fixes.
• Implemented and maintain partner program ERP 
• Data flow improvement
• Setup Data Governance
• Optimize and automate current manual process
• Maintain product category mapping
• Maintain asset delivery reports and overviews
• Create and maintaining a weekly report on live products
profile_positions.title: Master Data Specialist & Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing data in MS Dynamics AX and Exact, which is a challenging assignment as we are managing data in 5 instances of 3 different ERP systems. Master Data Management is key in the Life Fitness organization, as high-quality data not only enables proper decision making, but also is a must in ensuring that we can do reporting, our inventory is correctly valued financially, and we maintain the links between AX, Exact and Oracle.

Worked on different Business Operations projects. These are aiming to improve our systems and processes, to be able to serve our internal customers better, who in turn can serve our external customers better. Being quick to respond to internal requests is crucial, but delivering quality solutions is just as important. It is expected that the person performing this role looks critically at processes and comes up with innovative solutions which help to improve our efficiency. The improvement activities are executed in agreement with the team’s manager to ensure that we are working towards a common goal.

Main Responsibilities:

•	Participate in new product introduction projects to set up items in AX and Exact, in line with supplier systems
•	Maintain Master Data: in AX and Exact, ensure that master data is high quality, up-to-date and reflects the last known state of costs, prices, supply chain data, etc.
•	Build solutions in our MS Access databases for ad-hoc and recurring business requests
•	Work with the Sales Operations Coordinator to ensure that e-Con and our master data are in sync
•	Ensure that phase-in and phase-out are done in line with Product Management’s guidelines and Supply Chain’s input
•	Maintain tables related to Master Data: such as item groups, sales discounts, service object items, etc.
•	Cross-functional work with internal customers: cooperate with Product Management, Sales, Service, Supply Chain, Finance and IT as needed to resolve questions, issues
profile_positions.title: Master Data and Sales Operations

profile_positions.description:
Reporting Services - Philips Lighting reporting team within the Information Management Department, responsible for reporting projects and rolling out the reporting strategy and concepts within the organization. The main mission is to enable company growth and business decisions, through relevant and accurate reporting, provided near real time.

As a central team, Reporting Services is also responsible for the roll out of self-service reporting as well as KPI harmonization (in collaboration with the Group Performance Management department).

Primarily functioned under the Digital Marketing and Supply Chain & Operation Centre of Excellence. 
Ensuring weekly & monthly reports are created and maintained.

Main Responsibilities:

· Support the business with reporting requirements and questions
· Create reports in SAP Design Studio / Lumira / Analysis for Office / Advanced Excel
· Perform Data Analysis
· Perform data extraction through SAP BusinessWarehouse
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Information Management Reporting and Insight
